title: 317A.061 FOREIGN NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS; SECTIONS APPLICABLE.
text:
Except for this section and section 317A.651 concerning merger or consolidation, this chapter does not apply to foreign nonprofit corporations.
(a) Except as provided in paragraph (b), a foreign nonprofit corporation is subject to chapter 303. Unless it complies with chapter 303, a foreign corporation may not transact business in this state.
(b) Sections 303.02, subdivision 2; 303.07; 303.14; 303.16, subdivision 2, clause (6); and 303.22 do not apply to foreign nonprofit corporations.
